### Invitation to Tender: Building 48 Demolition at Fredericton Research and Development Centre

#### Tender Details

* Reference: WS4378225720
* Solicitation Number: WS4378225720
* Publication Date: January 26, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: February 13, 2024, 2:00 PM (EST)

#### Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified suppliers to participate in a two-phase tender process for the demolition of Building 48 at the Fredericton Research and Development Centre in Fredericton, New Brunswick.

#### Contractor Selection

The two-phase selection process consists of:

1. **Pre-Qualification**: Suppliers must meet the minimum requirements outlined in the pre-qualification package.
2. **Financial Bid**: Pre-qualified suppliers will submit a financial bid based on the specifications and drawings.

#### Contact Information

* Sonia Stockman, PSPC (SPAC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5
* Phone: Not available
* Email: [sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Tender Requirements

* Suppliers must demonstrate the technical capability to complete the project.
* The supplier with the lowest price will be selected.

#### Notice of Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the terms of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Notice of Expiry

Tender applications closed on February 13, 2024, 2:00 PM (EST)
